member.name: M:CitiesManager.WebAPI.Controllers.CitiesController.GetCities
member.summary: Returns all cities from cities table
member.returns: List of cities in json format

member.name: M:CitiesManager.WebAPI.Controllers.CitiesController.PutCity(System.Guid,CitiesManager.Core.Entities.City)
member.returns: The city object updated in json format

member.name: M:CitiesManager.WebAPI.Controllers.CitiesController.PostCity(CitiesManager.Core.Entities.City)
member.summary: Inserts a new city object to the Cities table
member.returns: The inserted city in json format

member.name: M:CitiesManager.WebAPI.Controllers.CitiesController.DeleteCity(System.Guid)
member.summary: Removes a specific city form Cities table
